H0.text: Producing red blood cells is how the circulatory system works with the respiratory system in the human body.

H1.text: Transporting oxygen to organs is how the circulatory system works with the respiratory system in the human body.

H2.text: Providing nutrients to muscles is how the circulatory system works with the respiratory system in the human body.

H3.text: Controlling the movement of the lungs is how the circulatory system works with the respiratory system in the human body.

A4.text: Gas exchange occurs in the lungs, whereby CO2 is released from the blood, and oxygen is absorbed.

A5.text: The pulmonary vein returns the now oxygen-rich blood to the left atrium.
